entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -32.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
